OMG! That IS him, I just know it!

And was anyone as intrigued as me by the glimpse of broad half naked 
chest inside that kimono????

The hentai thoughts are not my fault I've just been reading about the 
lecherous Maeda Toshiie  his 12 yr old wife (when he was 22), 16 kids 
and the concubine who was 33 yrs his junior (!)
